faq.question: Can I use Upstash Search in production?
faq.answer: The current version of Upstash Search is in Preview/Early Access. We do not guarantee the uptime SLAs for this service for now. So you can use it on your own risk.

faq.question: How can I upgrade to pay as you go from free tier?
faq.answer: Once you enter your credit card, your database will be upgraded to the pay-as-you-go plan and limits will be updated.

faq.question: What is the max limit (topk) for queries?
faq.answer: 1000 is the default limit for topk.

faq.question: In payg billing, what is counted as a query?
faq.answer: Search and upsert requests are counted as billing requests. Reranking requests have a separate billing.

faq.question: What is reranking? When should I use it?
faq.answer: It is a feature that re-ranks the results of a query using LLM models. It is useful for improving the quality of the results. You can enable it when you are not happy with the results of the default ranking.

faq.question: Are search and upsert requests same price?
Are there free trials?
faq.answer: Yes, we can provide free trials for Pro and Enterprise plans for testing and PoC purposes. Email us at support@upstash.com

faq.question: How much is the price for bandwidth?
faq.answer: We don't charge for bandwidth separately. It is included in the query based price.

faq.question: How many databases can I create?
faq.answer: You can create up to 10 databases for free and beyond this you will be charged $1 per database up to 100 databases.

faq.question: How many indexes can I create?
faq.answer: You can create up to 10,000 indexes in a single database.

faq.question: How many documents can I create?
faq.answer: You can create as many documents as possible within pay-as-you-go plan's max data size limit which is 50GB. If you need more, please contact us at support@upstash.com.
